hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description:
Pebble's first official timer! Set up to eight different timers and watch them run down in either a list view or "bubbly" detailed one.

Timers longer than fifteen minutes also push a pin to your timeline.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
Pebble's first official timer! Set up to eight different timers and watch them run down in either a list view or "bubbly" detailed one.

Timers longer than fifteen minutes also push a pin to your timeline.

hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description: Time anything you wish with this beautifully simple stopwatch app! It runs in the background and can hold up to twenty laps.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description: Time anything you wish with this beautifully simple stopwatch app! It runs in the background and can hold up to twenty laps.

hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description: This watch face really shines on Pebble Time, but you can use it on B&W Pebble too. It displays time with small animation each minute. If there is no Bluetooth, it hides stripes (Pebble) or make them gray (Pebble Time).

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description: This watch face really shines on Pebble Time. It displays time with small animation each minute. If there is no Bluetooth, it hides stripes (Pebble) or make them gray (Pebble Time).

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description: Simple color watchface, as seen in the Pebble Time Kickstarter campaign. Uses antialiasing.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description: Minimalist analog watchface with expand-from-dot animation. Picks a random color every time the minute changes. As seen in the Pebble Time Kickstarter campaign.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
Turn your Pebble Time into an awesome enciphering machine! Very well animated to make time and date change even more amazing. First line shows current year, highlighted line shows time and bottom line shows current date. It's time to spin!

Designed by Alex Kirov.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description: A simple digital watch with time, day and date with an emphasis on battery preservation code.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
Inspired by Piet Mondrian's Composition II in Red, Blue, and Yellow, 1930. 

Mondrian's work is in the Open Domain.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
Simple but very nice digital watchface designed specially for Pebble Time. Animated every minute however battery friendly. Inspired by Material Design.

Designed by Alex Kirov.

hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description:
The Misfit App inspires you to live an active life by turning your Pebble into a round-the-clock activity and sleep tracker.  Download now to track your sleep and activity, set goals, and see history all on your Pebble. 

What’s new in v3.2: 
- Improved syncing 
- Fixed sleep tracking bugs

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
The official Uber app is here!

The Uber app gets you where you need to go right from your wrist. With the press of a button, you can request an Uber to your location, set a favorite destination, and watch your car arrive, all without taking out your phone. Once you’ve gotten there, check out all the rides you’ve taken on your timeline.

Product features:
- Configure favorite locations for pickup and dropoff
- Set your pickup location to either your current location or one of your favorites 
- Choose from a list of standard uber products
- Confirm / accept surge pricing if it occurs in your area
- Set a destination from your favorite locations
- Request an Uber product
- Track the car on the map as it arrives
- See time to arrival on your timeline
- See all the rides you've taken in your past timeline
***** Quick order: long press the middle button from the first screen to immediately order the same kind of car you ordered last to your current location

hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description:
Play and discover music you'll love. Just start with the name of one of your favorite artists, songs, genres or composers and we will do the rest.

Instructions: 
    Up Button: short press - volume, long press - thumbs up 
    Middle Button: short press - play/pause, double press - skip, long press - station list
    Down Button: short press - volume, long press - thumbs down

hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description:
"One of the greatest and most pointless games I have ever had the pleasure or wasting my life on" – Ty Gadberry

Become the greatest miner in the Pixelverse. How deep can you go?

"The best game I've ever seen on a Pebble" – Samuel Schaffranek


If you have problems saving, this is a known device issue. Please factory reset your Pebble.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
Become the greatest miner in the Pixelverse. How deep can you go?

Pixel Miner has been redesigned and upgraded with full color support on Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel.

"One of the greatest and most pointless games I have ever had the pleasure or wasting my life on" – Ty Gadberry

"The best game I've ever seen on a Pebble" – Samuel Schaffranek

hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description: Get in shape with this simple 7-Minute Workout app! Never forget to exercise with a daily timeline reminder, and receive a pin when you complete it.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description: Get in shape with this simple 7-Minute Workout app! Never forget to exercise with a daily timeline reminder, and receive a pin when you complete it.

hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description:
Evernote is an easy-to-use, free app that helps you remember everything across all of the devices you use. Stay organized, save your ideas and improve productivity at home, at work, or on the go.

By downloading the Evernote application, you agree to the terms and conditions of the Evernote End User License Agreement (http://evernote.com/eula)

hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description:
Introducing the all-new ESPN app on Pebble, packed with live scores from the sports you love including MLB, College Football, Men’s College Basketball, NFL, NBA and NHL. What more could any sports fan ask for?

- Tracks multiple games at once
- Vibrates for game updates and score changes 
- Flick to update on demand
- Flick to toggle time and logo
- Tap Back to return to the top of list

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
Introducing the all-new ESPN app on Pebble ready for Pebble Time, packed with live scores from the sports you love including MLB, College Football, Men’s College Basketball, NFL, NBA and NHL. What more could any sports fan ask for?

Now featuring the all-new ability to keep tabs on your teams and games right on your timeline! Open a game to add a team's games to your timeline.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
Upcoming travel information on your timeline. Connect with TripIt® to have your reservations automatically sync, or manually add flights from settings. Quickly access phone numbers, addresses, and other reservation information right on your wrist!

Flight Tracking:
• Reminders for check-in & departure
• Notification when the departure changes*
• Weather for arrival and the day's summary

Additional Reservations:
• Hotels
• Car Rentals
• Restaurants
• Cruises
• Activities

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
⁉️ Question or comment?
I'd love to hear from you! Please email TimelineFlights@gmail.com or tweet @TimelineFlights.

❤️ Enjoy using Travel?
Please remember to give it a heart! You can also help support costs and development from Travel's settings. 

Flight Data Powered by FlightStats®
Weather Data Powered by Forecast.io

*Timeline pins may take up-to 15 minutes to sync. Please use caution when exact flight information is needed.

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
The official Eventbrite app. 

Log into Eventbrite and automatically see all of your events right on your timeline. Click on an event to download the ticket to your watch!

hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description: Swarm on Pebble will help you learn more about where you're at, and check-in to your favorite spots right from your wrist!

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
Swarm on Pebble will help you learn more about where you're at, and check-in to your favorite spots right from your wrist. 

Now available on Pebble Time! See where and when you checked in right on your timeline.

hardware_platforms.name: aplite
hardware_platforms.description:
FitCat features both a virtual pet and an activity tracker in a single watchapp. 

Watch Gnocchi, your cat, live his own life on your wrist. What he does depends on what YOU do: if you are walking, he will be walking too. If you are chilling, he will be chilling too. 
The more you move, the more virtual money you earn. Then you can use that money to interact with Gnocchi and make him happy. 

FitCat is the funniest way to live an active life. 

Features:
-	Different animations of the cat 
-	Many environments
-	Integrated mini game 
-	Background worker for step counting 
-	You can set your daily step goal and see your achievements 

PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS BLACK&WHITE VERSION OF FITCAT HAS LESS FUNCTIONALITIES THAN THE COLOR ONE.

If you like FitCat, give it a heart ! <3

There is still a lot more to come ... 
To stay tuned, follow me on Twitter : @PaulKubGames

hardware_platforms.name: basalt
hardware_platforms.description:
FitCat features both a virtual pet and an activity tracker in a single watchapp. 

Watch Gnocchi, your cat, live his own life on your wrist. What he does depends on what YOU do: if you are walking, he will be walking too. If you are chilling, he will be chilling too.
The more you move, the more virtual money you earn. Then you can use that money to interact with Gnocchi and make him happy.

FitCat is the funniest way to live an active life.

Features:
-	Different animations of the cat
-	Many environments with day and night variations
-	Integrated mini game
-	Background worker for step counting
-	You can set your daily step goal and see your achievements
-	Timeline pins to inform you about your daily step goal

If you like FitCat, give it a heart ! <3

There is still a lot more to come ... 
To stay tuned, follow me on Twitter : @PaulKubGames
